    Tapjoy iOS SDK Reference

    Important API Changes from 9.0.x

    • To include the updated Tapjoy library in your project, drag Tapjoy.embeddedframework into your project and choose the option “create groups for any folders”
    • To include the Tapjoy header file, use #include <Tapjoy/Tapjoy.h>
    • The TapjoyConnect class is deprecated and replaced with Tapjoy
    • getTapPoints is no longer called automatically upon connect — you must call this method manually if that behavior is desirable
    • removed deprecated methods setUserdefinedColorWithIntValue: and setUserDefinedColorWithRed:WithGreen:WithBlue:
    • for the full list of changes, visit the change log at the Tapjoy Knowledge Center
